definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: All the kings of the earth sought audience with Solomon to hear the wisdom God had put in his heart.
sentences.chinese: 普天下的王都求见所罗门，要听神赐给他智慧的话。

sentences.english: And the whole earth sought the presence of Solomon to hear his wisdom, which God had put into his mind.
sentences.chinese: 普天下的王都求见所罗门，要听神赐给他智慧的话。

sentences.english: The whole world sought audience with Solomon to hear the wisdom God had put in his heart.
sentences.chinese: 普天下的王都求见所罗门，要听神赐给他智慧的话。

sentences.english: May God bless freedom-loving people everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 愿上帝保佑普天下热爱自由的人民。

sentences.english: And he said unto them, Go ye into all the world, and preach the gospel to every creature.
sentences.chinese: 他又对他们说，你们往普天下去，传福音给万民听。

sentences.english: When I spread my wings and fly through the clouds, I am everywhere a cause of alarm.
sentences.chinese: 我只要展开双翅，直冲云宵，普天下又有谁不惧怕？

definition: land under heaven/the whole world/the whole of China/realm/rule
a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
